title: Lisa Faulkner’s second wedding dress revealed after John Torode nuptials
text:
Lisa’s wedding gowns were beautiful (Picture: Victoria Faulkner, Instagram, James Frear Photography)

A first-look at Lisa Faulkner’s second wedding dress has been revealed and she looked a vision.

The former EastEnders actress married her beau John Torode last week at Aynhoe Park, Banbury after seven years of dating.

Confirming their nuptials, Lisa, 47, shared a photo of her walking hand-in-hand with the Masterchef star wearing her beautiful wedding gown, which featured a plain satin skirt with a high-necked lace overlay and cap sleeves on the bodice.

And now, a glimpse of her reception dress has been shared on Instagram and it’s just as stunning.

With more of a simpler look than her main wedding gown, Lisa opted for a plain satin dress with spaghetti straps and a low back.

In the photo shared by her sister Victoria, Lisa and John, 54, are seen sharing a sweet embrace with the actress’ hands cradling the side of her hubby’s head.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Victoria said in the caption: ‘This wedding: a perfect day for my beautiful sister who looked like a princess…well, she’s found her prince, and witnessing these two on their wedding day was the most wonderful feeling, everyone in the room felt the love, it radiated out along with happiness and joy.

‘Thank you for letting us share your special day, I keep looking at the photos to relive it again and again! Love you brother in law! @johntorodecooks and of course my incredible sister @lisafaulknercooks #allyouneedislove #lovelovelove.’

Lisa replied: ‘I love you sisty xxxx.’

After seven years together, Lisa and John tied the knot on 29 October and it looked like a dream day.

Clearly overwhelmed with emotion, Lisa said in an Instagram post: ‘The happiest day of my life!!! Cue the wedding spam for the next few weeks! Apologies in advance. Yesterday I married the man of my dreams @johntorodecooks and we had the BEST Day EVER, filled with all our family and friends and such Love.

‘Thank you @aynhoepark we didn’t want to leave! #allyouneedislove photo courtesy of @jamesfearphotography.’

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Lisa Faulkner opted for a simple yet stunning gown for her wedding reception after marrying Masterchef's John Torode.
